title: France, Germany respond to Britain's action against Russia
text:
France, Germany respond to Britain's action against Russia 1:15pm GMT - 01:06 
French Foreign Minister Jean-Yves Le Drian says France will be in contact ''at the highest level'' with Britain to coordinate their response to the poisoning of Sergei Skripal. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
French Foreign Minister Jean-Yves Le Drian says France will be in contact "at the highest level" with Britain to coordinate their response to the poisoning of Sergei Skripal. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2pf5LMN
